Tucson holds his damaged arm which for some reason, could not be fixed.  He=
 directs an ear over to Leo Prime and Wing Caliber with a soft sigh.

" The=
 chamber renewed my strength but was unable to repair my damages.  At the s=
ame time, I had the dream.  I was first brought to Master Yokitron's traini=
ng facility, where I was mentored with Straight Shot and Nightshift.  Then =
I was transported to a large cave, not far from the Ark, where I am now sen=
sing Rodimus's position.  Yes, I know who resides there, and I must go ther=
e.  He's expecting me.  His time grows short or else he would not have reac=
hed out to me as he had."

Straight Shot and Quickstride look to Tucson.

"=
 So he's not dangerous after all?"

Asks Straight Shot.  Tucson smiles to e=
veryone.

" No on the contrary he's been our friend for a long time.  He ju=
st happens to be very old and keeps mostly to himself.  And since you two w=
ere the first to encounter him, I'm sure he would like to meet you and the =
others before his time expires."

Straight Shot smiles.

" Since you put it=
 that way, wow, sure, now that we know he's not a threat. So howcome Saberb=
ack can't control him?"

Tucson points to his chest.

" I think it's becaus=
e my spark is somewhat connected to him.  All right, we haven't got much ti=
me, he's dying and he has requested my presence.  We must go quickly."

At =
the large cave, the old dragon hears Rodimus exploring the cave and slowly =
repositions his body so he can look to him directly.  It wasn't Tucson but =
he could sense that Rodimus was a friend.  With his long tail he gestures R=
odimus to enter into his sub cavern where he could get a better look at him=
. With soulful eyes and gentile look upon his muzzle, he welcomes his visit=
or graciously, giving him one of his shed silver scales as a remembrance of=
 their encounter.  Then he could sense it, the one who he truly called for.=
  Just outside the cave, having moved rather quickly for a bulky Autobot, t=
he Silver warrior arrives as he had done in his dream.  He hopes the others=
 were not far behind.  Straight Shot had transformed into her alt mode for =
the trip but gets back into robot mode, once having arrived at the cave.

"=
 It's as my dream foretold.  We're here."

Straight Shot is now met by Quic=
kstride.

" Here we go again, this time, we know he's not having any of us =
for lunch."

Tucson chuckles and then leads the group to the dragon who now=
 has Rodimus for company.  Upon seeing Tucson, the old dragon slowly lifts =
his head to Tucson's chest.  The blue light which once beat within his spar=
k chamber beats once again but with greater intensity.  Before things begin=
 to transpire, the old dragon looks down to Straight Shot and Quickstride, =
with a gentile air of apology.  He had never meant to frighten them.

" It'=
s okay, Tucson explained everything.  We know you were just looking for som=
e company.  We shouldn't have been so hasty, assuming you were a threat. I'=
m glad we got the chance to actually meet you."

She gives the dragon a fri=
endly rub on his snout as does Quickstride.

" Gee, too bad we didn't meet =
ya sooner big fella."

After things were sorted out between them, the drago=
n turns Back to Tucson.  It was time.  The dragon places his snout on Tucso=
n's chest as the warrior places his hand on the dragon's forehead.  A blue =
laser like light is ejected from three ports on Tucson's chest as the beams=
 now scan over the old dragon.  A very bright pulsating light develops in T=
ucson's chest as it quickly envelopes himself and the dragon, turning them =
both into a silvery shimmering entity.  Soon the two begin to melt into one=
.  The light dims, revealing a warrior of shimmering silver, where Tucson a=
nd the dragon once stood.   The warrior opens his bright blue optics which =
gives the cave light where there once was darkness.  He looks around and fo=
r the first time in vorns he can see.  

" Rodimus, everyone, I can see all=
 of you.  The dream was a vision.  Better times are ahead and the dragon kn=
ew exactly what needed to transpire.  My Autobot shell was weakening and wo=
uld not have lasted much longer.  And now, I am the Silver Dragon, but plea=
se, call me by my original name. "

He looks outside with a strong stance i=
n his new trans metal draconic form.  He transforms into his new alt form a=
nd takes a strong stance at the foot of the cave.  Now a much younger and s=
tronger version of the Silver Dragon, Tucson makes his voice heard, hoping =
that Saberback hears his assertive message.  A booming draconic roar is sen=
t over the skies as a warning is cast to the enemy that the guardian lives =
again.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 4, 2011, at 7=

" We went to survey the construction site for the wind turbine and we went

stride now speaks up.

s not. It has a tenant, a very

gles to keep her composure.

tually vibrated the cave and no

uge reptilian animal covered with

really long tail. We didn't hang

as dangerous or not. All we knew, it
> > was enormous, had the same feature=
s as Hydras, but with only one head and it
> > had really big teeth and cla=
ws."
> >
> > Tucson stumbles back in surprise.
> >
> > " You - just describ=
ed something I saw in a dream I just woke up from."
> >
> > The duo stare a=
t him in shock. Neither one of them able to move or speak.

"And what do you suppose this means?" LEO PRIME said as he tranformed
> int=
o robot mode. "Do you think that this reptile is connected to your
> dream?=
"
> 
> WING CALIBER transformed and landed next to LEO, "There are some who=

> put great stock in dreams."
> 
> A call comes in from RODIMUS PRIME. "I =
have arrived at the location
> Quickstride and Straight Shot were calling f=
rom. My sensors are
> picking up the signs of some reptile, and man is it b=
ig! I am
> investigating."
> 
> "Rodimus" LEP PRIME said firmly, "Be carefu=
l. We don't what that thing is yet."
> 
> "I gothcha." RODIMUS said as he s=
igned off.
>

>
